author: Steve Holland
title: After Trump halt to WHO funds, U.S. could redirect money to aid groups: officials
description: The United States could redirect to other international aid groups some $400 million it would have paid the World Health Organization this year, senior Trump administration officials said on Wednesday after President Donald Trump halted funding for the U.N. a…
content: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The United States could redirect to other international aid groups some $400 million it would have paid the World Health Organization this year, senior Trump administration officials said on Wednesday after President Donald Trump halted… [+3186 chars]
